name: Cards war: poorly made edition
description:
Cards war is a turn based card game made by me, and is obviously very poorly made(because im lazy)

this game is currently in development, which means theres no gameplay yet, only menu, the board to play with turn system and dragging cards, and the card collection of all cards in the game. future updates comes with more cards and gameplay!

art are made by me and some are non-copyright arts from the internet and some are my friend's art (of course they want me to add them to the game)
